title: HTML & CSS Fundamentals
description: Learn the building blocks of web development with HTML and CSS
fullDescription: This comprehensive course covers everything you need to know about HTML5 and CSS3. You'll learn semantic HTML, CSS layouts, responsive design, and modern web development practices.

title: JavaScript for Beginners
description: Master the fundamentals of JavaScript programming
fullDescription: Start your journey into web development with JavaScript. Learn variables, functions, DOM manipulation, and build interactive web applications.

title: React.js Crash Course
description: Build modern web applications with React.js
fullDescription: Learn React.js from scratch. Understand components, state management, hooks, and build real-world projects.

title: Python Web Development
description: Build web applications with Python and Django
fullDescription: Learn backend development with Python. Master Django framework and build robust web applications.

title: Ethical Hacking Basics
description: Introduction to penetration testing and cybersecurity
fullDescription: Learn the fundamentals of ethical hacking and cybersecurity. Understand common vulnerabilities and protection methods.

title: Italian Cooking Masterclass
description: Learn authentic Italian recipes and techniques
fullDescription: Master the art of Italian cooking with traditional recipes and modern techniques from expert chefs.

title: Sourdough Bread Baking
description: From starter to perfect loaf - master sourdough
fullDescription: Learn the complete process of sourdough bread making, from creating your starter to baking perfect artisan loaves.

title: Organic Vegetable Gardening
description: Grow your own organic vegetables at home
fullDescription: Learn sustainable gardening practices to grow healthy, organic vegetables in your backyard or containers.

title: Beekeeping for Beginners
description: Start your journey into beekeeping and honey production
fullDescription: Comprehensive guide to starting and maintaining beehives, harvesting honey, and supporting local ecosystems.

title: Natural Skincare Formulation
description: Create your own natural skincare products
fullDescription: Learn to formulate safe, effective skincare products using natural ingredients and scientific principles.

title: Professional Makeup Artistry
fullDescription: Learn professional makeup application for various occasions, skin types, and personal styles.

title: UI/UX Design Principles
description: Design beautiful and functional user interfaces
fullDescription: Master the principles of user interface and experience design for web and mobile applications.

title: Digital Marketing Strategy
fullDescription: Learn to create and execute successful digital marketing strategies across multiple platforms.

title: Mobile App Development
fullDescription: Learn to develop mobile apps for iOS and Android using modern frameworks and tools.

title: Data Science Fundamentals
description: Introduction to data analysis and visualization
fullDescription: Learn the basics of data science, including data cleaning, analysis, and visualization techniques.
